changeSet.author: msingla
changeSet.sql: insert into venue (id, name, description, type, comments, rating, added_on) values ((select nextval('hibernate_sequence')), 'Sample', 'descript', 'PALACE', 'Comment', '4.5', now());

changeSet.author: msingla
changeSet.sql: insert into attachment (id, name, image_url, entity_id, added_on) values ((select nextval('hibernate_sequence')), 'Sample', 'sample url', (select id from venue where name = 'Sample'), now());
